dcterms:creator: R. Ying
D. Bourgeois
J. You
M. Zitnik
J. Leskovec
dcterms:description: The BA-Shapes dataset contains Barabasi-Albert (BA) graphs decorated with house-structured motifs in random positions. Nodes are numbered 0 to 3 for not-participating, located on the top, middle, and bottom of the motif.
dcterms:title: BA-Shapes

dcterms:creator: R. Ying
D. Bourgeois
J. You
M. Zitnik
J. Leskovec
dcterms:description: The BA-Community dataset is a set of graphs made by a combination of two graphs from the BA-Shapes dataset with doubled node classes. Each node in the BA-Shapes subgraph is given with the node feature based on its community membership.
dcterms:title: BA-Community

dcterms:creator: R. Ying
D. Bourgeois
J. You
M. Zitnik
J. Leskovec
dcterms:description: The Tree-Cycles dataset contains an 8-level tree with randomly attached hexagonal cycle motifs. The task is to binary classify each node regardless of whether it participates in cycle motifs.
dcterms:title: Tree-Cycles

dcterms:creator: R. Ying
D. Bourgeois
J. You
M. Zitnik
J. Leskovec
dcterms:description: The Tree-Grid dataset is a replacement of the cycle motifs into 3-by-3 grid motifs from the Tree-Cycles dataset.
dcterms:title: Tree-Grid
